title: Nye onyinye nye Temple Orbital
heading: Mezue onyinye gị
chooseHow: Họrọ otu ị ga-achọ isi mezuo onyinye gị na-ewepụ ụtụ isi:

option1.heading: Nhọrọ 1: Nye onyinye n'ịntanetị Ugbu a
option1.description: Mezue onyinye gị ozugbo site na iji kaadị kredit, kaadị debit, ma ọ bụ ụzọ ịkwụ ụgwọ n'ịntanetị ndị ọzọ site na onye nkwado mmefu ego anyị nwere nchekwa, Ubi . Ị ga-enweta akwụkwọ nnata ụtụ ozugbo.

option2.heading: Nhọrọ 2: Nkwụnye ego ụlọ akụ na Roy Foundation
option2.description: Nyefee nkwụnye ego ụlọ akụ ozugbo ma ọ bụ nyefe waya na Roy Foundation , onye mmekọ anyị na onye na-akwado mmefu ego. Nhọrọ a dị mma maka nnukwu onyinye ma ọ bụ mbufe mba ụwa.
option2.instructions: Biko tinye " Orbital Temple - {donationType} " na mpaghara ntụaka. Mgbe ịmechara mbufe gị, zitere anyị ozi na sathi.roy@orbitaltemple.art na nkọwa mbufe gị iji nweta akwụkwọ nnata ụtụ gị.

taxInfo.heading: Inye ihe n'ụtụ isi
taxInfo.description: Templelọ nsọ Orbital bụ ọrụ nkwado ego nke The Field (Performance Zone Inc.) , otu 501(c)(3) ọgbakọ anaghị akwụ ụgwọ. A na-ewepụ ụtụ isi nke US niile ruo n'ókè iwu kwere.
